properties.areaDesc: Coastal Waters OF Northwestern Puerto Rico out 10 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 18 at 4:22AM AST until February 19 at 8:00PM AST by NWS San Juan PR
properties.description:
...Hazardous marine conditions are expected to continue through
the workweek...

.Enhanced winds with a northerly swell is resulting in hazardous
seas that will persist through at least mid-week. Most of our
local waters will be impacted by the seas generated by the winds.
Atlantic waters and passages will be impacted by the swell from
the north.

* WHAT...East winds 10 to 20 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and seas
4 to 6 feet expected.

* WHERE...Coastal Waters of Northwestern Puerto Rico out 10 NM.

* WHEN...From 2 PM this afternoon to 8 PM AST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous for small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 8 PM AST WEDNESDAY
